extendedInfo.description: The CUNY J-School Research Center's mobile app is designed to support mobile journalism and to help faculty and students access the latest research training, tools and resources for journalists.Search our research databases from the field, as well as the tip-sheets and guides prepared by news research pros like Backgrounding People and Businesses, Legal Docs and Court Info in Reporting and Census Data for Reporting.You can also search the CUNY catalog, which includes the Research Center's collection of approximately 2,000 print volumes and 40,000+ electronic books, many of which are available to view on your handheld device.

reviews.title: Useless.
reviews.comment: Does nothing. You can\'t register for an account. When you click to research databases it won\'t give you access to any of them. Its just a description. What\'s the point? It\'s insulting.
reviews.author: Hidden Palm
